alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 9:18PM CDT until April 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 918 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Loveland, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grandfield, Chattanooga, Faxon, Hollister and Loveland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
